title: League client keeps failing (Error 003)
body:
Hi everyone,

Just wanted to see if anyone else is getting the issue where your client will not load after downloading the new patch.

It comes up with an error code; Error 003, and tells you to check the server status, which is all ok.

Thought i'd see if anyone else is getting the issue, or if it is just me and my friends, for some ironic reason.

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Having the same issue on my side as well as about 5 other people in my Discord Server.

I put a ticket through to Rito but who knows when they'll get onto it.
